nodes.text: During the First Order/Resistance War, the First Order attacked an Aeosian village as part of its campaign to deny the Resistance access to former Rebellion bases in the Outer Rim Territories. The Ace Squadron pilots Kazuda Xiono and Griff Halloran stumbled upon the abandoned village while scouting the planet Aeos Prime. They were capture by the Aeosians but Xiono managed to broker peace between the Colossus space station and the Aeosians. Later, the village was destroyed by the First Order during the Suppression of the Aeos system.
